body.name: SIVEPY Projector With Wifi and 5.1 Bluetooth, 5G WiFi Native 1080P/12000L 4K Supported, Portable Outdoor with Carry Bag Projector Video Projector Phone Projector with Screen for iPhone,TV Stick, Mac
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 34 mins
features: 📽️【Native 1080P Full HD Resolution & 4K Support】Equipped with real native 1920*1080 full HD resolution and 4K Support technology, SIVEPY Q9 video projector provides brighter, more vivid, and color-vibrant images and videos with 1920x1080 real resolution at a 10000:1 contrast ratio while the 12000 ANSI lumens brightness brings every detail to life.

📶【2.4G/5G Dual-Band WiFi & 5.1 Bluetooth Connection】SIVEPY WiFi Bluetooth projector provides 2.4G/5G dual-band WiFi connections that support both wireless and wired projection for iOS and Android systems making a faster speed, wider range, and smoother transmission than other 2.4G single-band projectors. With the upgrade 5.1 Bluetooth chip, this wireless projector easily connects to various Bluetooth speakers and headphones to improve the sound of parties or outdoor entertainment events.

Ⓜ️【Multi-Device Connectivity & 2 Hi-Fi Stereo Speakers】Our home theater projector with its multiple wired interfaces (TF, AV, HDMI, USB, VGA, audio interface) effortlessly connects smartphones, computers, speakers, USB devices, game tablets, TV sticks, TF cards and more. Without any external speakers, you can enjoy great stereo sound with the 2 built-in 4x3W dual stereo speakers. You can also plug in external speakers via the 3.5mm Aux port for better sound by the 5.1 Bluetooth connection.

🔎【350’’ Giant Screen & Innovative 75%-100% Zoom Function ±15° Keystone Correction】The 4K outdoor projector with Wifi and Bluetooth will bring You an ultimate visual feast with 4:3/16:9 aspect ratio and its watching size from 40” to 350” (projection distance between 4.3ft-31.9ft). With a 75% -100% zoom function, you can adjust the projected image without moving the projector. ±15° keystone correction and scaling make setting up and getting the perfect screen position a breeze.

🔇【Advanced Two-Way Cooling Fan System & Low Noise &Timer Mode】Adopted the most advanced raw materials to build an efficient cooling system and fan noise suppression system that efficiently dissipates heat and reduces fan noise by 80%, providing you with an amazing viewing and listening experience. With a 240min timer mode feature, you can fall asleep with noise < 30db while watching your favorite content.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SIVEPY Native 1080P WiFi Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth Specifications: Display Resolution: 1920 x 1080Power Supply AC IN: 100V-240V 50/60HZProjection Display: 40 - 350inchesProjection Distance: 4.3 - 31.9ftKeystone Correction: Manual ± 15 °Aspect Ratio: 4: 3 / 16: 9Max Support Resolution: 4KDisplay Technology: LCDLight Source: LEDLamp Life: 55000HrsLumens: 12000LContrast Ratio: 10000:1 Package Details: 1 x Projector, 1 x Tripod, 1 x Carry Bag, 1 x 100" Screen, 1 x Remote Control, 1 x HDMI Cable, 1 x AV Cable, 1 x Power Cable, 1 x Instruction Manual

Equipped with Upgraded 5.1 Bluetooth Connection The Bluetooth projector is equipped with the latest Bluetooth 5.1 chip and adopted the creative bidirectional Bluetooth technology, which makes the transmission more stable. Not only can this wireless projector be easily connected to Bluetooth speakers, Bluetooth headsets, Bluetooth soundbars, or other audio devices, but it can also be used as a speaker to connect to smartphones/tablets freely to improve the sound of parties or outdoor entertainment events.

2.4G & 5G Dual-Band WiFi Connection & Wired Connection The WiFi projector is equipped with an advanced 5G WiFi chip with 5G and 2.4G dual-band WiFi functions that can effectively avoid signal interference to ensure a stable signal for a wider range and smoother transmission than other traditional projectors. 1. Wireless Connection: 2.4G & 5G WiFi Connection - With WiFi function, it offers 2 ways to connect your phone (Supports Android and iOS)； A. Connect your phone to the projector's internal Wi-Fi for seamless screen mirroring. Perfect for outdoor or Wi-Fi-limited scenarios. B. Connect the home projector to your home Wi-Fi network for seamless screen mirroring. 2. Wired Connection: Our TV projector supports a variety of devices with its multiple wired interfaces (TF, AV, HDMI, USB, VGA, and 3.5mm headphone port), effortlessly connects smartphones, computers, speakers, USB devices, game tablets, TV sticks, TF cards, and more. Immerse yourself in a world of multimedia content and enjoy a seamless experience.

Utral Large 350'' Display & 3 Installation Options Utral large 350'' Display This outdoor movie projector with a 100" screen can project a screen of up to 350 inches, providing you with more choices and operation space for a brilliant big-screen visual experience accessible. Also, a 100" screen is included which can offer you a start movie everywhere, feel at a cinema, and enjoy a visual feast with your family and friends! Support Ceiling/Tripod/Table Installation Whether you prefer ceiling mount, tripod mount, or table placement (with included angle adjustment screws), our projector offers versatile installation options to suit any situation. Flip your image vertically or horizontally to accommodate various projection needs. With a 360° inversion function, it can be projected from the front/back/ceiling. Recommended projection size is 40-120 inches. You can project on the wall at home and watch movies in any size you like. Bringing you a wonderful movie night and home.

Restores True Color, Sharp and Vivid Picture With 1920*1080 native resolution, 12000 lumens, 80% NTSC, LCD technology, and a 10000:1 contrast ratio, the home projector improves the resistance to ambient light and creates clear, stable, sharp, and vivid images during day and night. Pitch an awesome home theater with your family getting off work or at the weekend. Innovative 75%-100% Zoom Function With the zoom function, Q9 video projector can shrink the image size from 75%-100% through a remote without frequently moving the projection distance to adjust and get the proper screen size you want. It's time to say goodbye to the venue or angle restrictions and immerse ourselves in a wonderful movie night. Foucusing / Keystone Function Perfectly align your projections with rotate ±15° the ''Focusing / Keystone Ring'' manually to achieve razor-sharp focus, delivering superior image quality and crispness in any placement direction.

Built-in Dual Stereo Speakers Immerse yourself in an immersive audio experience with the built-in dual stereo speakers, delivering rich and dynamic sound that enhances your viewing pleasure. You can connect the projector with an external speaker via Bluetooth or a 3.5mm Jack cable to improve the sound. Whether you're watching movies, gaming, or enjoying your favorite music, the powerful and balanced audio will take your entertainment to the next level. Advanced Cooling Tech Adopted 2 cooling fan systems with quick heat dissipation technology and fans noise suppression system, the heat of the lamp can be effectively cooled and reduces fan noise by 80%. It is normal that the fan has a sound when turning on the projector or playing some bright video because the fan is working hard to cool the projector to protect the lamp. Timer mode and Lower Noise Our iPhone projector comes with a 240min timer mode feature, you can set it to automatically turn on/off as needed, making it energy efficient and keeping quiet. Sleep peacefully with noise < 30db while watching. (Please Turn OFF the Sleep Mode while playing movies to avoid "shut off")

Multimedia Home Theater Projector SIVEPY home theater movie projector supports a variety of devices with its multiple wired interfaces (TF, AV, HDMI, USB, VGA, audio interface). Effortlessly connect smartphones, Firesticks, laptops, video game consoles, Xbox, speakers, USB devices, game tablets, media players, iPad, iPhone, Android smartphones, TF cards, and more. Immerse yourself in a world of multimedia content and enjoy a seamless experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it. Great Value.
reviews.reviewText: Bought it for Halloween to project spooky holographic images onto a screen. Picture looked great. Will now use this summer outside near the pool. Great image, great quality. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PROJECTOR SCREEN ONLY
reviews.reviewText: SIVEPY 100 inch Portable Indoor/Outdoor Projector ScreenPROJECTOR SCREEN ONLYNOT ACCURATE ON WEBSITEThis is ONLY THE PORTABLE FOLDABLE SCREENLightweightPortable and FoldableDouble SidedWrinkle-Resistant Anti-Crease ScreenWashableEasy installThanks for ReadingMasonMasonaroundtheglobe

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s a good screen. Was hard to remove the spinning wrinkles. Used the dryer, steamer and ended up washing it to try to get them out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Think big sheet but thicker
reviews.reviewText: What I received was a thick sheet with some basic options for you to hang it. So it does work for you outdoor viewing needs but so would a sheet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This projector is user-friendly.
reviews.reviewText: This projector is user-friendly and produces a clear picture, making it suitable for use in my apartment. The package includes all the necessary components for installation. Following the instructions provided, I measured the distance from the wall and was able to successfully operate the projector. The image quality is comparable to that of a well-known brand, featuring outstanding color and clarity. Furthermore, adjusting the focus is a straightforward process.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes the experience
reviews.reviewText: Before i got this i was using a white bed sheet and let me tell you: it is worth buying the screen for sure! The screen is way easier to set up, way better picture quality, and can with stand the weather alot better than the bed sheet! It completely makes the movie experience and is worth getting if you plan on using a projector outside for movies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best time!
reviews.reviewText: We love it! This is a first class projector screen with a size of 100 inches. My family is big into movie nights, and someone brought up doing a projection movie, so I found this. The quality is unmatched with a double side projection screen. In the box you will also find 6 hooks for simple assembly to use. This is made to be used either indoor or outside. What I found amazing about the design of this is the fact it has a 160 wide viewing angle. This allows our family or friends to sit comfortably without being too close to others, and truly relax. We watched Avatar 2 on this, and boy what a fun time we had. Another factor in selecting this projection screen was "storage" - I really despise clutter in my house, so this was perfect as it can be folded and stowed away until ready to be used. With that, it is portable and so you can travel or bring it over to a fiends place for a movie night- boxing night- superbowl. SO many ways to use this projection screen. It is a great investment in my humble opinion.Specs on thi projection are as follows:Hooks and rope are included - HOWEVER, the nails are NOTOverall, I am quite pleased about this 4k projection screen - the visual is very good, not blurry or distorted. The thickness is 2.5" thicker than other competitors- it is decent and had no issues with the background being impacted by the actual thickness. Therefore, based on my usage and experience with this projection screen, I would suggest to others to look at this one as it meets and exceeds most of all my expectations. The price point does seem fair and accurate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for movie nights
reviews.reviewText: My wife and I always wanted to have movie nights on a large scale. I used to project our movies on a window screen but it was see through so I decided to get this product. Now I have a nearly perfect theater in my living room window. I just wish it had some suction hooks so I could attach it directly to the window. But everything else it’s perfect.
